newsitem.title: UK: NWE straight-run fuel oil steady, well supplied.
newsitem.headline: NWE straight-run fuel oil steady, well supplied.

text.p: NWE high sulphur straight-run fuel oil remains in good supply despite healthy recent purchases, traders said.
One refiner said he saw up to 80,000 tonnes loading out of Klaipeda in the next ten days, as well as a couple of M-100 cargoes from Tallinn.

In the Med, a trader was heard bringing 100,000 tonnes of high sulphur straight-run material from Rabigh and other mideastern locations. At least part of the cargo was thought likely to move into Greece.
